law.text: Every company shall cause to be printed on the transfer tickets issued by it to passengers the conditions under which such tickets may be used. Whoever uses a transfer ticket in violation of any such condition, or whoever uses or attempts to use a transfer ticket not issued to him, or whoever for value disposes of or attempts to dispose of to any other person a transfer ticket issued to him, or whoever for value delivers or attempts to deliver a transfer ticket not issued to him to any person, shall be punished by a fine of not more than fifty dollars or by imprisonment for not more than one month.
